member.name: T:EMS.Ems
member.summary:
The Ems class provides a CLS compliant, MWArray interface to the MATLAB functions contained in the files:
C:\Users\YKF\Desktop\m\flower.m
C:\Users\YKF\Desktop\m\gun.m
C:\Users\YKF\Desktop\m\lever.m
C:\Users\YKF\Desktop\m\scissors.m
C:\Users\YKF\Desktop\m\shield.m
C:\Users\YKF\Desktop\m\spiderman.m
C:\Users\YKF\Desktop\m\stapler.m

member.name: M:EMS.Ems.flower
member.summary: Provides a void output, 0-input MWArrayinterface to the flower MATLAB function.

member.summary: Provides the standard 0-input MWArray interface to the flower MATLAB function.
member.param: The number of output arguments to return.
member.returns: An Array of length "numArgsOut" containing the output arguments.

member.name: M:EMS.Ems.WaitForFiguresToDie
member.summary: This method will cause a MATLAB figure window to behave as a modal dialog box. The method will not return until all the figure windows associated with this component have been closed.
member.remarks: An application should only call this method when required to keep the MATLAB figure window from disappearing. Other techniques, such as calling Console.ReadLine() from the application should be considered where possible.
